segments.text: I have to find a living room set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are you planning on looking for one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can tell you where I got mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you go to find yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the furniture from IKEA cost a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The furniture cost a couple thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How good of quality is the furniture ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very sturdy . You get what you pay for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't mind paying for quality workmanship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I assure you that you're paying for quality .
segments.speaker: S2
